title: Blockchain for Supply Chain Transparency
description: A system implementing blockchain technology for improving transparency and traceability in global supply chains. The project uses Hyperledger Fabric to create an immutable record of product movements and transformations.
author: John Smith

title: Machine Learning for Crop Disease Detection
description: An application of convolutional neural networks for early detection of plant diseases through leaf image analysis. The system can identify 38 different diseases across 14 crop species with over 95% accuracy.
author: Sarah Williams

title: AR Applications for Educational Environments
description: Development of augmented reality applications to enhance learning experiences in STEM subjects for secondary education. The project creates interactive 3D models that students can manipulate through a mobile application.
author: David Rodriguez

title: Smart Energy Management System for Residential Buildings
description: An IoT-based system for monitoring and optimizing energy consumption in homes. The system uses machine learning to predict usage patterns and automatically adjusts settings to reduce waste.
author: Michelle Lee

title: Natural Language Processing for Medical Records Analysis
description: Application of NLP techniques to extract and analyze information from unstructured medical records. The system helps identify patterns and correlations that might be missed in manual review.
author: James Wilson

title: Secure Authentication System Using Facial Recognition
description: Development of a secure authentication system that uses facial recognition with liveness detection to prevent spoofing attacks. The system employs deep learning models to achieve high accuracy.
author: Emma Johnson

title: Sustainable Urban Planning Using GIS and AI
description: Integration of Geographic Information Systems (GIS) with artificial intelligence to optimize urban planning for sustainability. The project develops models for efficient transportation networks, green spaces, and resource allocation.
author: Carlos Mendez

title: Blockchain-Based Voting System
description: Implementation of a secure and transparent voting system using blockchain technology. The system ensures vote integrity, voter anonymity, and provides real-time auditing capabilities.
author: Aisha Patel

title: AI-Driven Financial Fraud Detection
description: Development of an AI system that detects fraudulent financial transactions in real-time. The project uses anomaly detection and machine learning to identify suspicious patterns with minimal false positives.
author: Michael Zhang

title: Virtual Reality for Surgical Training
description: Creation of a VR-based surgical training platform that provides realistic simulations for medical students. The system includes haptic feedback and performance analytics to enhance learning outcomes.
author: Sophia Kim
